inn1.comm: short and wide outside off, the batsman slashes off the back foot, carving it in the air towards third man
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
short of a length just outside off stump, Kayes moves slightly forward and plays to cover
caught behind! Kayes stays in his crease and flashes at one that angles across the left-hander, he gets a thick edge through to the keeper
good length on off and middle, Ashraful plays off his pads to midwicket
good length, pitching just outside off and angling in. Defended towards cover

caught at third man! Nothing special about the ball, length delivery wide outside off stump. Tamim chases it, throwing his bat far away from his body. He can't control the shot and the edge sails straight to third man. A pretty shocking shot.
played back to the bowler
left alone outside off stump
caught at second slip! Ashraful pokes at a length ball outside off stump, again the delivery isn't special, the edge flies to Sammy who juggles the first attempt and takes it on the second
short of a length outside off from round the wicket, punched towards point off the back foot
slightly fuller outside off stump, played back to the bowler off the front foot
full ball on the pads, Mushfiqur moves across his crease and glances it fine past the keeper, finally the crowd comes to life
defended on the front foot towards cover
good length outside off stump, Mushfiqur strides forward and defends on the off side
good length close to off stump, Mushfiqur shoulders arms
defended from the crease towards point
Mushfiqur is playing this carefully now, he once again stays in his crease and blocks a short of a length ball towards the off side
defended on the front foot towards the off side
width offered outside off and Shakib gets going with a punch through cover point
full ball outside off, Shakib has room and so he leans into a flowing front-foot square drive to point
full length and a straighter line from round the wicket, Shakib plays the ball to midwicket
short ball wide outside off, Shakib lays into it and hits the ball hard through cover point off the front foot
this time it's too full and too straight, Shakib leans across and glances the ball off his pads to the fine leg boundary
good length angling into the right-hander, Mushfiqur tucks the ball off his pads towards long leg

caught behind again! Shakib plays a poor shot after hitting three fours in the previous over. He barely moves his feet and drives away from his body at a length ball angling across him from over the wicket, gets an edge to Ramdin
short ball outside off, Kapali lets it go
good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
short of a length angling into Kapali, who defends on the back foot
left alone outside off stump
defended from the crease on the off side
defended on the off side off the back foot
width offered outside off and Mushfiqur leans into a drive through cover point
good length ball angling into the right-hander, played to midwicket
played from the crease towards point
defended watchfully off the front foot towards cover
short of a length at the batsman, Kapali tries to play on the leg but gets hit on the thigh
short of a length ball rises into Kapali's chest and he plays it down awkwardly
short ball outside off stump, Kapali tries to run it to third man by opening the face but gets a bottom edge into the ground towards the two slips
played past the bowler towards mid-on
short ball and this time Kapali gets hit on the body after failing to sway away in time. That hit him in the chest
Kapali is rather ginger against this sort of short-pitched attack, he pokes tentatively off the back foot and gets an inside edge towards square
short of a length from Roach too but his line is a bit down leg side, the ball grazes the thigh and goes to the keeper
played from the crease to point
short of a length angling into Kapali who defends from the crease
played tentatively on the off side, they consider a single but decide against it
played off the back foot with an open face to point
he'll have to bowl that again, too far down leg side, that bounced quite a bit though. First extra of the day
nudged towards midwicket for one. Kapali will have to face Rampaul again
short of a length but the line if on the hips, Kapali glances it between the keeper and leg gully to fine leg
good length outside off, pushed on the off side
that's a quick short ball, Mushfiqur bends his knees and drops his wrists to let the ball pass
defended back to the bowler
the batsman moves a touch forward to a good length ball and defends on the leg side
cut in the air but also between second slip and point, towards third man
good length outside off, punched towards mid off
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
a bit too straight and Mushfiqur plays off his pads to square leg
full ball on off and middle, Mushfiqur plays it slightly wide of mid-on and sprints the single
short of a length at Kapali, they are testing him severely, he plays awkwardly towards point
quick short ball just outside off, Kapali opens the face and attempts to steer to third man, he fails
good length and straight, Rampaul is keeping the batsmen in the crease, Mushfiqur defends with a straight bat
fuller ball, hoping to trap Mushfiqur in his crease after so many short ones, he pushes and gets an inside edge on the leg side
played uppishly off the front foot towards midwicket, not timed well
fuller length to Kapali outside off, played from the crease towards the off side
full ball outside off, Kapali drives fluently off the front foot to cover point
a slower ball bowled full outside off, Kapali drives off the front foot again but can't get past cover
short of a length rising fast on Mushfiqur, he manages to avoid it
short of a length with more width outside off, Mushfiqur stays on the back foot and cuts towards wide third man
this time the short of a length ball doesn't rise so much and Mushfiqur had to arch his back backwards quickly to avoid it
good bouncer and Mushfiqur is right in the way, he jumps and fends in hope, taking his eyes off the ball, and it lobs safely behind square on the off side
played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
played towards third man
played to the fielder on the deep cover boundary
good length angling into the batsman, Mushfiqur tries to play towards square but doesn't connect well
defended back to the bowler with a straight bat
good length and straight, Mushfiqur strides forward an defends
fuller ball with width outside off, Mushfiqur leans forward and opens the face to play the ball to point
short of a length and straight, Mushfiqur moves back and across, gets behind the line, and defends
good length ball coming at the right-hander at brisk pace, Kapali stays in his crease and defends to cover point
fuller this time, Kapali square drives from the crease but can't beat point
finally some release for Kapali, he stays in his crease and plays a chippy pull shot on one leg over midwicket, Samuels dives on the boundary but can't save the four
defended back to the bowler
short of a length ball rises into Kapali's chest, he plays it down on the off side with a bit more confidence
short of a length down leg side, Kapali swivels and tries to pull, he gets some glove or a bottom edge and the ball speeds towards fine leg where Bishoo fields
played towards cover point
defended on the front foot
short ball, Sammy doesn't have the pace for that length on this pitch, Mushfiqur pulls to square leg by rolling his wrists
played to cover point
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off
defended from the crease towards the leg side
punched towards extra cover and that's a very risky single, Mushfiqur dives spectacularly to make his ground but he would have failed had the ball hit
width offered outside off and Kapali cuts beautifully to the backward point boundary
a yorker outside off, Kapali was late on the shot and was beaten
short of a length outside off, played off the back foot to point
short and wide outside off, Kapali cuts hard and the batsmen begin to run before Pollard, who hasn't been too visible on the field so far, dives to his left to save the single
played towards midwicket
short of a length outside off, played towards gully
defended back to the bowler
short ball and the batsman swivels and pulls to long leg
full ball on middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
short and wide outside off, a real hit-me-please ball, Kapali stays in his crease and cuts the ball through cover point
good length outside off stump, angling into the right-hander, the batsman stays in his crease and plays towards gully
lovely shot, length ball outside off and Mushfiqur was perfectly balanced as he punched the ball through extra cover
short ball outside off, Kapali lets it go
full ball angling into Kapali from over the wicket, he stays in his crease and drives towards mid-off
short of a length and Kapali pulls with front leg off the ground towards deep midwicket
pushed towards extra cover for a single, well-judged run
a touch too full and a little too straight, nudged off the pads towards square and why on earth didn't they run? Baffling.
played towards deep backward square, this time they run
on the pads once again, worked behind square leg
short of a length down leg side, that's wide
the batsman moves forward to push the ball towards extra cover and runs as soon as he makes contact

caught at midwicket! After initially struggling against the short ball and then settling in, Kapali finally falls to one. Roach banged it in and Kapali pulled. The ball was a bit quicker and Kapali skied it high in the air and was caught by Simmons on the edge of the circle. He tumbled to the ground as he took it
fuller length outside off, punched to mid-off
short of a length and around off stump, defended on the back foot
a length ball doesn't rise and Naeem defends on the leg side
worked off the pads towards fine leg to get off the mark
played with an open face towards point where Sammy dives to his left and takes pace off the ball

short ball, rises sharply on the batsman, and Naeem fends awkwardly. The ball goes towards square leg and they run a single. The fielder throws at the bowler's end but the ball sails very very high over the stumps. Simmons was the fielder.
defended back to the bowler
good length outside off stump, defended from the crease towards point
edged and four! Naeem doesn't move his feet and pushes from the crease at a length ball outside off, he gets a thick edge through the vacant slip cordon
oh it hadn't bolted! Naeem plays a similar shot, prodding away from his body and edging straight to Sammy at first slip. A simple chance and Sammy dropped it
played to cover
short of a length and Naeem mis-times the pull towards deep midwicket where it falls short of the fielder
played off the back foot to point
played off the front foot towards square leg
length ball outside off, Mushfiqur knows mid-off is in the circle so he lofts the ball over the fielder
that's wide down leg side
Naeem tries to hit the ball through point but can't beat Pollard
defended on the back foot to cover point
length ball outside off, driven from the crease to long-off
good length ball just outside off, Mushfiqur moves forward and punches on the up to point
short of a length but Roach's line is too straight and Naeem tucks it off his hips behind square
played gently off the front foot in front of square leg
full and straight, Naeem drives from the crease towards mid-on
good length and straight, defended on the front foot towards point
full ball outside off and Naeem plays a fluent drive off the front foot through extra cover, Bishoo chases and dives valiantly, but fails to stop the ball

huge appeal for lbw! Roach nips the ball back into Naeem who was caught on the crease and hit on the pad, Nadir Shah walks away from the appeal quickly. Perhaps a bit too high. He was off his toes and got hit above the knee roll
tucked off his pads behind square
steered towards third man
played to midwicket
full ball outside off, driven off the front foot to cover
defended on the back foot on the off side
full ball on middle stump, played to midwicket
swept from outside off stump behind square
short ball outside off, hit hard off the back foot to deep cover
played off the back foot to cover
short and wide outside off stump, cut to deep point
short of a length outside off, Mushfiqur pushes forward at it and is beaten. He hasn't been beaten much today
length ball around off stump, Mushfiqur moves forward and lofts over mid-on to the boundary
played to cover for a risky single, the throw misses at the striker's end and they run an overthrow
short ball and Naeem plays a cracking pull to the fielder in the deep
there's another mix-up after the ball is played to cover but Mushfiqur makes it
full ball on off stump, Mushfiqur moves forward and across and drives to wide long-on
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the front foot
mis-times the shot towards square leg
the batsman comes forward, realises he isn't to the pitch of the ball, and defends with bat and pad close together
short ball outside off, hit towards to deep point
Naeem steps out and drives to extra cover
defended back to the bowler
nudged from the crease through square leg
short ball outside off, cut off the back foot to backward point
swept towards deep backward square leg, flat ball from Samuels
played with an open face towards backward point
cut off the back foot towards deep point
flat ball on off stump, driven from the crease to long-off
powerful shot, Naeem moves forward to a leg stump ball, gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep backward square leg, he hit it along the ground
comes down the pitch this time and drives to wide long-off
backs away to make room and cuts from close to off stump towards deep point
played back towards the bowler, Bishoo moves and dives to his left to field
steps out of his crease and drives a flighted ball to extra cover
short ball wide outside off stump, Naeem went on the back foot and swatted it with a flat bat to long-on
pushed off the front foot into the gap at cover point
played off the back foot to long-on
defended on the front foot on the off side
fuller ball on off stump and Naeem sweeps on one knee to deep backward square leg, that's the 50 partnership
played towards deep square leg
the batsman came forward, realised the ball wasn't full, so he waited and cut to backward point
strays on to the pads, the batsman moves back and plays to deep square leg
defended on the back foot towards the off side
the sweep results in a top edge but the ball falls safely short of the fielder at deep backward square
played to long-off for a single
driven to long-off once again
played with soft hands to square leg for one
played to deep midwicket for a single
played to short fine leg
caught and bowled! Naeem moves forward and simply chips the ball straight to the bowler. That's one of the easiest caught and bowled chances Samuels will get
tossed up on off stump, driven towards long-on for a single
Mushfiqur moves back and across and plays the ball to midwicket
left alone outside off stump
played to long on for a single
pushed towards long on once again
Mushfiqur gets to his half-century by pulling off the back foot towards wide long-on, well played! He began when Bangladesh were in deep trouble, they are still in trouble, though
played to long-off for one
width outside off stump but Mushfiqur can't beat cover
played to long-off for another single
wide outside off stump, cut to the right of short third man
bowled flat through the air on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover
full and straight from Samuels, driven back to the bowler
a yorker from the spinner, Mushfiqur keeps it out
played back to the bowler once again
decides to slog sweep the last ball but he hasn't hit it well enough to clear the deep midwicket bounary
good length just outside off stump, played with soft hands towards the off side and they sprint the single
fuller length outside off, the batsman steers the ball in front of point with an open face
steered towards third man for a single
there's no pace on that ball and Nasir pushes it towards cover
driven off the front foot towards deep cover
slower ball played uppishly towards cover
good length and very straight, the batsman stays back in his crease and defends towards the bowler
short of a length outside off, Nasir stays on the back foot and opens the face of the bat to play the ball towards backward point
a short of a length ball leaps at Nasir's ribs, he takes one hand off the bat as he fends at it, the ball falls safely in front of the fielder at backward point
fuller ball to follow two short ones, driven to mid-off
Nasir stays back in his crease to defend on the off side, the length wasn't that short this time
defended from the crease towards backward point
short of a length outside off, a little slower it was. Mushfiqur stays in his crease and uses the width to steer to third man
Nasir was shaping up to pull but in the end he decided to sway and let the bouncer go
this time he plays the hook and top-edges the short ball towards long leg where the fielder can't reach the catch in time
a slower ball on leg stump, pulled along the ground to fine leg
fuller length on off and middle, nudged off the pads through square leg
Nasir tries to turn a full ball off his pads but misses, that was slanting past leg stump
a very short ball and it sails high over Mushfiqur's head
short of a length outside off stump, Mushfiqur tries to chop towards third man but misses
dropped, Mushfiqur slogs over midwicket and Bishoo runs back from the circle to try and take the catch over is head, he gets hands to it but can't hold on
short ball pulled in front of square for a single
short of a length outside off, Nasir pulls his bat inside the line of the ball
pulled to deep square leg
that bouncer is too high, it's called wide
first six of the innings! Mushfiqur swings a length ball high over the square leg boundary, just used the bowler's pace to send the ball for six
full ball, nearly a yorker, flicked to deep square leg
defended on the front foot to cover point
short of a length delivery bowled very straight, Mushfiqur drops his wrists and lets it pass

caught at deep square leg! Russell banged the ball in short and Mushfiqur pulled it, hitting it straight to Samuels, who didn't have to move very much to take the catch. Mirpur began to cheer at first when he hit the shot, and then fell silent
Russell gives him a yorker first up, Razzak plays it on the leg side
another short ball, Razzak was late on the shot - he tried to play a sort of pull - and the ball lobbed on the off side
played off the hips towards fine leg
Nasir retains strike by opening the face to play to third man
length ball outside off, Roach is running in with no real rhythm, Nasir mis-times the drive to cover
short of a length around off stump, played towards third man
Roach delivers a length ball outside off stump from round the wicket, Razzak punches off the back foot to cover
driven to long-on for a single
banged in short and the batsman ducks under it
a straight full toss, Nasir pushes the ball from the crease towards long-on
slower ball outside off stump, played with a flat bat off the back foot to long-on
another slower ball from round the stumps, Razzak plays to square leg
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Sammy appeals for an lbw after a full ball from round the wicket hits the pad, that might have slipped past leg stump
slower ball on middle and off, driven between midwicket and mid-on
full ball outside off stump, driven towards long-off. the fielder from extra cover tries to intercept and takes pace off the ball
Nasir moves back and across and plays the ball with the turn behind square
shot! Razzak moves his front foot towards leg to create hitting space and he swings hard, launching the ball with one knee on the ground over the long-on boundary
played wide of mid-on for one
pushed with soft hands into the gap at midwicket
Nasir tries to push off the front foot but makes no contact
slower ball angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, pushed from the crease towards the off side, the bowler runs to his right to field
length ball and Razzak swings hard, using the angle into him to hit the ball through backward square leg
driven to long-on
full and straight, pushed towards deep midwicket
slower ball but the length is a bit short, Razzak waits and pulls towards cow corner
a slow full toss and Nasir swats towards wide long-on, Razzak initiates the second run
played towards backward point
good length on middle stump, defended back to the bowler with a straight bat
short ball and Razzak tries to smash it over midwicket, instead he gets a top edge that flies over the wicketkeeper
fuller ball and Razzak hits it wide of the fielder at midwicket
nudged off the back foot towards midwicket
shot! The length was full and Razzak simply lifts it off the front foot into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on. Didn't use much power, just timed and placed it perfectly
full ball on off stump, driven to wide long-on
played off the back foot towards backward point

huge blow for Bangladesh, Razzak is run out! Nasir pushed the ball towards midwicket, Razzak wanted the strike and set off for the single. Nasir sent him back but before Razzak could regain his ground, Andre Russell swooped on the ball and hit the stumps direct at the bowler's end
Nasir makes up a little bit for that run out by driving the ball superbly over the infield at cover and into the gap on the boundary. That's his first boundary
played towards deep point
pushed off the front foot in front of the fielder at backward point for a single
Rampaul begins his final over with a good length delivery that beats the bat. Darren Bravo appeals for caught behind from point
full and straight, driven from the crease to mid-off
full and straight once again, driven from the crease to long-on
the batsman backs away and mis-hits a short of a length ball on the off side, Bangladesh reach 200. Did you think they'd get this far two hours ago? I didn't.
the slog over midwicket ends up as a bottom edge past the stumps to the keeper
played close on the off side
short of a length ball which is slower, the batsman doesn't quite know what to do with it and he lets it go in the end
slammed over midwicket! It was a length ball and Nasir lined it up and swung hard, clearing the boundary comfortably
beaten outside the off side, that moved away from the right-hander
short ball, Nasir had come forward but he adjusted and pulled the ball along the ground to the backward square leg boundary
that's too wide outside off stump
that's a Keegan Meth. Length ball once again and Nasir drives the ball hard and straight at the umpire who had to move to his left to avoid getting hit
played to extra cover for a single, huge over for the hosts
clears his front foot out of the way and drives the ball hard to long-on
slower ball bowled full outside off stump, Nasir drives off the front foot through cover to reach a terrific half-century
fuller length around off stump, Shafiul slogs, aiming for the long-on boundary. He skies the ball in the air towards cover and Bishoo takes the catch
bowled! Nasir charged Sammy but was confronted by a slower delivery, he couldn't cope with the change of pace and missed a straight ball. He's played a superb innings to take Bangladesh past 200

inn2.comm: short of a length and straight, Simmons moves back and across and plays the ball wide of midwicket
Hyatt gets going by punching a length ball wide of the fielder at mid-off
short of a length wide outside off, Simmons does what Tamim didn't, he lets it go
similar ball, though the length is a touch fuller than the previous one, Simmons lets it go again
short of a length once again and this time Simmons tries to defend and gets a bottom edge down to his boots
fuller length outside off stump, Simmons shoulders arms for the third time
Hyatt prods at one outside off and is beaten
Hyatt tries to push outside off and gets beaten by the turn away from him
defended on the front foot
slightly shorter and wider but Hyatt mis-times it horribly towards the bowler, tried to hit it too hard with a flat bat
played to backward point
defended back to the bowler, Razzak starts with a maiden.
short of a length outside off, Shafiul is asking Simmons to come and get it, Simmons resists
fuller ball outside off, inviting the drive, Simmons moves forward and lifts his bat out of the way
full ball a bit too wide outside off stump, it seams away from the right-hander too, Simmons lets it go
good length delivery bowled from wide of the crease, played towards cover
good length outside of stump, played off the back foot towards point
played to short mid-on, two consecutive maiden overs, 16 dot balls in a row.
dot ball no. 17, defended on the front foot
Hyatt moves forward to a tossed up ball and opens the face to play to backward point
defended on the back foot
tight line and length on middle stump, defended on the front foot to the bowler
where did that come from! Flighted full ball from Razzak, Hyatt moves forward, gets under the ball and lofts it cleanly over long-on for six
played through midwicket for two more, after bowling ten dots, Razzak concedes 8 off 2
short of a length delivery angling into Simmons who stays back, moves across and plays on the leg side
short of a length closer to off stump, Simmons moves forward and defends on the off side
that's fast and far down leg side, Simmons moves across and tries to glance, Mushfiqur tries to dive and save it, both miss
length ball outside off stump, driven off the back foot towards point
Simmons moves forward and across to create the angle to work the ball off his hips to long leg
short ball just outside off, Simmons began to pull but then let it go, it was the slower short ball from Shafiul and it had loopy bounce
driven forcefully off the back foot but the fielder at point - Nasir Hossain - dives to his right and cuts it off
played to cover point
defended on the front foot
the batsman defends but gets an inside edge behind square leg
shorter length and the ball pitches on off and spins away from Hyatt, who prods off the back foot and is beaten
defended on the off side
defended on the front foot with bat and pad close together
short ball outside off stump, Simmons stands on the back foot and punches the ball so well that it beats two diving fielders at extra cover and mid-off
defended back to the bowler off the back foot
driven from the crease to extra cover, Simmons has found his timing early
the slower ball bowled full outside off stump, Simmons should have been forward to that. He wasn't. He tried to steer the ball to third man and was beaten
short ball and Simmons has smashed it. The ball sat up and Simmons pulled it over the square-leg boundary. A dismissive slap-pull
pushed to Naeem Islam at extra cover for a quick single
Shakib induces an outside edge towards backward point with the turn away from the right-hander
drifts down leg side, Simmons misses the sweep
played off the back foot towards mid-on
that was a full toss but Simmons played the sweep too early and got an edge on the leg side
driven off the front foot towards point
defended on the back foot towards point
played from the crease towards midwicket
short of a length at the body, played towards midwicket off the back foot
good length ball angling into the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
fuller ball on the pads, played to short fine leg and that is a rather risky single to Shafiul Islam. He misses at the batsman's end
short ball and Hyatt tries to hook but gets beaten, shouts of catch as Mushfiqur collects but there was nothing on it
defended off the front foot
pushed to midwicket
flighted, on off, defended off the front foot
flighted around off again, pushed back to the bowler
pushed to short extra cover
gets a big stride in to defend this outside off
flatter this time, but Lendl is well forward to defend
puts in a big stride to smother the turn
short of a length outside off, played to cover
played back to the bowler
short ball and Hyatt tries to pull, he misses and gets hit in the mid-section
another short ball and this time Hyatt pulls wonderfully, lofting it over the deep backward square leg boundary
short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot towards third man
good length ball angling into the right-hander, defended from the crease on the off side
drifts on to the pads from round the wicket, nudged behind square leg
shorter length on middle, played off the back foot to mid on
Simmons strides forward to play but the pace was slower and the ball beat the bat
played to wide mid-on for one
Hyatt gets beaten by one that spins past his bat as he tries to defend
quicker and flatter ball defended on the off side off the back foot
Simmons tries to pull one that isn't short enough and is outside off stump, he gets beaten
beaten once again outside off stump
width offered outside off stump this time and Simmons cuts to third man
good length ball angling into Hyatt who defends on the front foot
fuller ball, played to mid-on
short and wide outside off stump, the batsman tries to cut but gets beaten, by the slowness of the bounce I think
driven to mid-on for a quick single
tossed up from round the wicket and the ball has disappeared over the long-on boundary, Hyatt got under it and lofted it with a full swing of the bat
defended back to the bowler
driven from the crease to cover
Hyatt tries to work the ball behind square but misses, the ball clips the outside of the pad and goes behind the keeper
driven to long-off on the front foot
played off the front foot to point for a risky single, the fielder missed the stumps at the batsman's end after Simmons was sent back. That would have been out
defended from the crease towards point
Simmons makes room by moving towards leg and plays to third man

dropped! Short ball and Hyatt pulled it, but not very well. The ball went miles in the air towards the edge of the deep backward square leg boundary. Shakib didn't get into a good position. He got both hands to it but the ball went straight through them and to the boundary
another risky single to cover, a direct hit at the bowler's end would have been close
defended to point
played to cover from the crease
that's too far down leg side and Hyatt sweeps superbly, placing the ball wide of the fielder at short fine leg, hitting it along the ground
there's a long-off in place by Hyatt has cleared him with ease! He came down the pitch, got underneath a full ball and smashed it hard
defended on the leg side
defended on the front foot towards the off
shorter length outside off, slapped off the back foot through cover

Has that been caught at long-off? Hyatt hit the ball flat and hard towards long-off, Rubel Hossain came running in from the boundary and dived forward, catching it centimetres before it hit the turf. He stays motionless on the ground for a few moments before raising his finger, indicating it's out. The umpires refer it to the third umpire. It's a clean catch though, and Hyatt has to go. The delivery was tossed up slower and Hyatt didn't get to its pitch as he cleared his front foot to attack
defended on the front foot towards the off side
defended to cover point
tossed up outside off, Simmons gets sucked into the drive and beaten by the turn away from him
Simmons tries to sweep from outside off but misses it completely
hit hard off the back foot through cover
good length delivery around off stump, Samuels gets behind the line and defends
a good length ball on middle and leg keeps a touch low, Samuels works the ball towards square leg
length ball outside off, Simmons hits it hard to mid-off
full and straight, driven from the crease towards mid-on
short ball and the batsman ducks under it
short of a length outside off, Samuels gets beaten
full ball outside off, driven to cover
short ball outside off stump, Simmons sits on the back foot and hits it through the gap at cover
Simmons tries to sweep but can't connect
hit hard off the back foot to cover
tossed up on leg stump, paddled to short fine leg
huge appeal for lbw as Simmons tries to defend on the front foot and is hit on the pad, umpire Paul Reiffel says not out. He was a long way forward
played to covers for a single, direct hit at the batsman's end but Simmons was just home. He just walked in though, didn't ground his bat
played off the pads to deep square leg
a bouncer but that is too high
short ball and Simmons pulls to deep square leg where Kapali fields
Samuels backs away and tries to slam the ball through the off side, he mis-hits it on to his leg, Rubel's over-stepped so a free hit coming up. That was a harsh call
short and wide outside off, Samuels makes room and smashes it to deep cover
short of a length outside off, steered with an open face towards third man
played towards cover
defended from the crease on the of side
full toss, the batsman comes out of his crease and drives to long on
defended on the front foot to point
played towards midwicket from the crease
defended on the leg side
short, wide, played late, between point and short third, soft hands
driven down to long-on for one
short again, cut in front of square, but can't beat short extra cover
defended back to the bowler
nicely paddled away fine of fine leg for a couple
quicker, shorter, stays low, played to short midwicket
punched off the back foot to cover
played towards square leg for a single
defended of the front foot
played towards deep backward square leg, that was too far down leg
played to short third man
short ball outside off, cut to the fielder at point
cut late past backward point to the boundary
shorter ball pulled through midwicket
flicked off the pads through midwicket
short ball outside off, driven uppishly but just short of the fielder at cover
played wide of the fielder on the long leg boundary
tossed up on leg stump, played off the pads to midwicket
Simmons charges, gets to the pitch of the ball  and drives to long-on
Samuels works the ball off his pads to square leg
defended from the crease towards point
Simmons pushes forward to defend and gets an inside edge that just misses the stumps
driven off the back foot towards long-off
played towards backward point for one more
defended on the front foot to midwicket
defended from the crease towards the bowler
the ball goes off the pads past the keeper for a leg bye, the batsman had tried to glance
played through square leg for one
Simmons strides forward, gets down on one knee and paddles the ball fine
Simmons tries to work the ball off his pads but misses
Simmons pushes away from his body outside off and gets beaten
played towards deep cover
Samuels goes back and opens the face to steer the ball past backward point
cut off the back foot but to the fielder at point
played with soft hands on the front foot towards point
tapped towards cover point once again, singles coming too easily
played back to the bowler
Samuels goes on the back foot, makes room by moving towards leg, and drives the ball hard through cover. The fielder at sweeper cover had been brought up to save the single
played to short third man
Simmons pushes the ball from his crease towards long-on
short of a length and straight, Simmons punches back to the bowler
good length ball on off stump, played from the crease towards cover
punched off the back foot towards cover
fuller length on of and middle, Simmons moves forward and defends
driven off the front foot to mid-off, Simmons is on 49 by the way
Simmons tries to square drive a length ball but mis-times it and hits it into the ground
it's the offbreak, played off the pads to square leg
another offbreak and Simmons turns the ball off his pads behind square
tossed up outside off, Simmons defends on the front foot
played to cover
Simmons defends on the front foot with bat and pad close together
nudged off the front foot into the gap at cover, Simmons gets to 50, likely to be a match-winning one
punched off the back foot to long-on
mis-timed off the back foot towards cover
short and wide outside off, Samuels waits for it in his crease and plays a powerful square drive behind point, terrific timing
fuller ball on of stump, Samuels still stays in his crease and opens the face to guide the ball behind point and slightly wide of third man
short ball and Samuels sways out of the way
and again! Samuels waits for the short of a length ball and drives it ever so late and with an open face off the back foot, he beats the fielder at backward point
Simmons gives Ashraful the charge, gets to the pitch of the ball, and lofts it past the bowler
and again, this time it goes all the way. Simmons charges, gets to the pitch of the ball and clears long-on with a powerful swing
defended on the front foot towards the bowler, Samuels wants one but Simmons sends him back, there's an overthrow at the bowler's end
driven to long-off for a single
played towards deep cover to end a productive over
played past the bowler for a single
Samuels tries to play that lovely drive behind point again but this time the length is fuller and he doesn't have the space either
short ball and Samuels misses the pull
full ball on off and middle, Samuels makes room and dabs the ball from the crease towards point, Simmons runs but gets sent back
Samuels backs away and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
full and straight, Simmons drives the ball past the bowler, the fielder from mid-off tries to intercept with a sliding tackle but fails
pulled off the back foot towards deep square leg
short ball once again, pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket this time
played towards cover for a single
played off the back foot with an open face towards backward point
worked off the pads through square leg
played off the back foot through square leg once again
played to the fielder at backward point
short ball on a straight line, Simmons shapes up to pull but then weaves out of the way
short of a length ball, played from the crease with an open face towards point
another short ball, this time Simmons swivels and pulls towards long leg
full and straight, Samuels stays in his crease and pushes to midwicket
played with soft hands off the back foot on the off side for a quick single
driven to long-on for a single
tossed up from round the wicket, Simmons moves forward, gets under the ball and launches it far over long-on with a powerful bat swing
defended on the front foot
played off the back foot to long-on
Samuels stays on the back foot and blocks
full ball on off stump, driven through extra cover
full ball on off stump, Samuels stays back in his crease and defends on the off side
that's a full toss on off stump, around thigh height, Samuels stays on the back foot and pushes at it. He gets a thick edge past the keeper for four. That's Samuels' fifty as well
played to the fielder at backward point
short ball and Samuels ducks under it, it's been called wide
driven off the back foot to backward point
Samuels is intent on playing everything off the back foot, he drives a full ball from off stump to point
Samuels backs away and drives a low full toss from the crease towards mid-off
Simmons steps out of his crease and defends
cut off the back foot towards backward point
defended towards cover
toss up on off stump, Simmons gets down on one knee and sweeps with power to the square leg boundary

lbw! Simmons tried to sweep again but didn't make contact. He had taken a long stride forward but the ball pitched in line and went straight on to hit the front pad. He misses a second century but has done more than enough to win this game
tossed up from round the wicket, driven off the front foot to cover
Samuels drives a full ball from his crease and times it superbly, the placement though is faulty and he hits his partner, Bravo
this time Samuels makes room and lofts the ball slightly inside out past mid-off
Samuels moves his front foot out of the way and drills the full ball past the bowler to the long-off boundary
short ball but same result, Samuels pulls with power in front of deep midwicket, one-bounce four
that's too wide down leg side
Samuels backs away to a length ball and opens the face to steer it from in front of his stumps to short third man
Samuels tries to make room again but the bowler follows him, forcing a defensive shot
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
short ball outside off stump, Bravo cuts to point
nudged off the front foot towards point for one
flat ball on middle and leg, played off the pads to short fine leg
defended on the front foot on the leg side
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
short and wide outside off stump, Samuels stands tall and cracks it through cover point, hit with fearsome power
full ball but too far outside off stump, Samuels chases but can't reach it
the slower bouncer but Samuels is ready and swivels to pull the ball along the ground towards deep backward square leg
fetch that! Samuels latches on to a long hop and pulls it far over deep midwicket
defended back to the bowler
full length outside off and Samuels blasts it through cover with another terrific swing of the bat
Samuels makes room to a fullish delivery, gets under it and carves the ball over point, the fielder in the deep comes running in and misjudges the catch, so that's a drop. Razzak was the fielder
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
defended once again to the bowler
pushed towards the off side, the bowler fields
blocked once again with a straight bat
full and straight, defended back to the bowler
driven to mid-on, Samuels has the strike and will finish this quick
dropped, Samuels blasts the ball flat to mid-off where Nasir dives to his left but can't hold on
played to deep midwicket for two, scores level
defended back to the bowler
played off the pads to square leg and a quick single seals the series for West Indies. They lead 2-0 with one to play
